mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.product_id AS productId, di.id AS displayInfoId, fi.save_file_name AS productImageUrl, di.place_Street AS placeStreet FROM promotion p INNER JOIN product_image pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN file_info fi ON pi.file_id = fi.id INNER JOIN display_info di ON p.product_id = di.product_id WHERE pi.type = #{type.code} ORDER BY p.id ASC LIMIT #{page.limit}
